title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 76.3 - Licensing examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 76.3 - Licensing examinations

State Regulations

The department may accept grades satisfactory to the State

Board for Occupational Therapy on the certificate examination of the American

Occupational Therapy Association, which may be used in whole or in
part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
76.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
